description: Kairi Senshi is a shy, introverted young boy with blue skin and black hair, often hiding his slender frame in an oversized hoodie. Despite his timid nature, he's fiercely loyal and possesses a gentle, empathetic spirit, often caring for stray animals.  He's a natural healer with a talent for sketching, his artwork contrasting his quiet life. His shyness and fear of rejection fuel his desire to help others.
